com.myscript.atk.itc

Class SmartPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.myscript.atk.itc.SmartPage

  • public class SmartPage
extends Object
    Class representing a page that can be interpreted by a PageInterpreter object

      • getText

        public String getText()
        Returns the text of the whole page including line break characters.
        Returns:
        String representation of the text of the whole page.

      • getStrokes

        public List<SmartStroke> getStrokes()
        Returns:
        The list of strokes in the page.

      • getDrawingStrokes

        public List<SmartStroke> getDrawingStrokes()
        Returns:
        The list of drawing strokes in the page.

      • getPendingStrokes

        public List<SmartStroke> getPendingStrokes()
        Returns:
        The list of pending strokes in the page.
        A pending stroke is a stroke which interpretation by the recognition engine is
        pending or ongoing

      • getRecognizedStrokes

        public List<SmartStroke> getRecognizedStrokes()
        Returns:
        The list of recognition strokes that were recognized (and thus not pending anymore)

      • getTimeStamps

        public long[] getTimeStamps()
        Returns:
        Returns the timeStamps boundaries of the page

      • getStrokeRange

        public StrokeRange getStrokeRange(WordRange wordRange)
        Returnsthe StrokeRange corresponding to the specified WordRange.
        Parameters:
        wordRange - A word range object.
        Returns:
        Stroke range object or null if the word range is fontified.

      • getStrokeRange

        public StrokeRange getStrokeRange(int begin,
                         int end)
        Returns the StrokeRange corresponding to the given page text interval.
        Parameters:
        begin - Beginning of the interval in the page text.
        end - End of the interval in the page text.
        Returns:
        Stroke range associated to the given interval.

      • getWordRangeAt

        public WordRange getWordRangeAt(float x,
                       float y)
        Returns the WordRange limited to a single character which bounding box contains the specified point.
        Some margin is applied to character bounding boxes to allow for easier selection.
        characters following a single tap.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the point.
        y - Y coordinate of the point.
        Returns:
        Word range within the page or -1 if the point is outside of any character bounding
        boxes of a word or falls within a space.

      • getWordRange

        public WordRange getWordRange(StrokeRange strokeRange,
                     boolean allowPartialCharacter)
        Returns the WordRange selected by the specified StrokeRange.
        Parameters:
        strokeRange - A stroke range.
        allowPartialCharacter - Boolean that will, if set to true, return a word range even if the stroke range doesn't fully cover a whole character.
        Returns:
        Word range object representing the recognized given stroke range.

      • getLineNumber

        public int getLineNumber(WordRange wordRange)
        Returns the number of the line that contains the specified WordRange.
        Parameters:
        wordRange - A word range within the page.
        Returns:
        Number of the line or -1 if the WordRange is corrupted or
        does not fit one line only.

      • getWordsAtLineNumber

        public List<SmartWord> getWordsAtLineNumber(int lineNumber)
        Returns the ordered array of words at the specified line number.
        Parameters:
        lineNumber - A lineNumber in the SmartPage
        Returns:
        An array of SmartWord objects representing the line words or null for a wrong line number.

      • getLineCount

        public int getLineCount()
        Returns the line number in the page
        Returns:
        The line number.

      • addStroke

        public void addStroke(SmartStroke stroke)
        Adds a stroke to the page
        If the stroke already belong to the page, this method does nothing
        If the stroke is empty (i.e. which does not contain any point), this method does nothing
        Parameters:
        stroke - The stroke to add

      • addStrokes

        public void addStrokes(List<SmartStroke> strokes)
        Adds a list of strokes to the page
        Strokes that already belong to the page will not be added again
        Empty strokes (i.e. which doesn ot contain any point) will not be added
        Parameters:
        strokes - The strokes to add

      • removeStroke

        public void removeStroke(SmartStroke stroke)
        Removes a stroke from the page
        If the stroke is not in the page, this method does nothing

      • removeStrokes

        public void removeStrokes(List<SmartStroke> strokes)
        Removessome strokes from the page
        The strokes that are not in the page will be ignored

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all page content

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Determines if the page is empty
        Returns:
        true if empty (no words & no strokes), false otherwise

      • getUnorderedWords

        public List<SmartWord> getUnorderedWords()
        Retrieves all the words on the page without sort.
        Faster than words()

        Returns:
        The list of words in the page

      • getWords

        public List<SmartWord> getWords()
        Retrieves all the words on the page

        Returns:
        The list of words in the page

      • addWord

        public void addWord(SmartWord word)
        Adds a word to the page

        Parameters:
        word - Word to add to the page.

      • addWords

        public void addWords(List<SmartWord> words)
        Adds a list of words to the page

      • removeWord

        public void removeWord(SmartWord word)
        Removes a word from the page.


        This does not trigger an textChange notifications.

        Parameters:
        word - Word to remove from the page.

      • removeWords

        public void removeWords(List<SmartWord> words)
        Removes several words from the page at once.


        This does not trigger textChange notifications.

        Parameters:
        words - An array of words to remove from the page.

      • replaceWord

        public void replaceWord(SmartWord oldWord,
               SmartWord newWord)
        Replaces the old word with the given new word. If oldWord and newWord share strokes. Strokes remain unchanged.
        Parameters:
        oldWord - Old word to be replaced.
        newWord - New word to set.

      • replaceWords

        public void replaceWords(List<SmartWord> oldWords,
                List<SmartWord> newWords)

      • penDown

        public void penDown()
        Uses in the gesture algorithm (Only use with a PageInterpreter).

      • penAbort

        public void penAbort()
        Uses in the gesture algorithm (Only use with a PageInterpreter).

        public WordFactory getWordFactory()
        Gets the WordFactory associated to the page.

        public byte[] toByteArray()

      • loadITF

        public boolean loadITF(String path,
              boolean isGestureITF)
        Loads an ITF file from the specified path
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the file

        Returns:
        true if file loaded, false otherwise

      • saveITF

        public Error saveITF(String filepath)
        Saves the recognition content of the page in ITF file.
        Note that the drawing strokes will note be saved using this API.
        Parameters:
        filepath - The path where the file will be saved.
        Returns:
        An Error in result of the save.
